utility

Class CallListUtility

  • java.lang.Object
    • utility.CallListUtility

  • public class CallListUtility
extends java.lang.Object
    This utility class contains methods for sorting the patient call lists in a manner chosen by the user.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  CallListUtility.SortType
      This enum type holds indicator values for the sort type.

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void reverseSortPatients(java.util.ArrayList<Patient> callList, CallListUtility.SortType sortBy)
      This method sorts the patients in the given list in descending order.
      static void sortPatients(java.util.ArrayList<Patient> callList, CallListUtility.SortType sortBy)
      This method sorts the patients in the given list in ascending order.

      • sortPatients

        public static void sortPatients(java.util.ArrayList<Patient> callList,
